Method Detail

getPlayers

public int getPlayers()
Returns:
players Returns the number of players in the current game (1 or 2).

interact

public void interact()
This method starts the main loop that controls interaction within the game. Game loop: 1- read player movement 2- move the person 3- redraw 4- wait for next move 5- check for winning condition

invActivate

public void invActivate()
Activate the invincibility power-up and store the exact activation time.

isInvActive

public boolean isInvActive()
Check if the invincibility power is still active (if it is <1 minute from its last activation).

moveEvils

public void moveEvils()
Moves each one of the 3 evil circles randomly

movePlayer

public boolean movePlayer(boolean north,
                          boolean south,
                          boolean east,
                          boolean west)
Moves the Player, if the game is in single-player mode Moves Player 1, if it is in 2-player mode

movePlayer2

public boolean movePlayer2(boolean north2,
                           boolean south2,
                           boolean east2,
                           boolean west2)
Moves Player 2, if the game is in 2-player mode

setPlayers

public void setPlayers(int players)
Set the number of players in the game.

Parameters:
players - The number of players (1 or 2).
